definition: of or related to New World monkeys having nostrils far apart or to people with broad noses, hairy-faced arboreal monkeys having widely separated nostrils and long usually prehensile tails
details:
adjective
- of or related to New World monkeys having nostrils far apart or to people with broad noses
= synonyms: platyrhine, platyrhinian, platyrrhinic, broadnosed, platyrrhine
noun
- hairy-faced arboreal monkeys having widely separated nostrils and long usually prehensile tails
= synonyms: platyrrhine
